content: **from the description ** a garden of flowers in a rainbow of pretty spring colors will brighten your home year-round with this fresh floral set that makes a great project for using up partial balls of colorful size 10 thread **skill level ** intermediate **gauge ** - rnds 1 and 2 = 7/8 / 2 2cm - square = 4 5 / 11 4cm **materials ** coats knit-cro-sheen crochet cotton size 10 - 450yds new ecru #61 - 120yds spruce #179 - 120yds mid rose #46a - 100yds maize #123 - 64yds crystal blue #25 - 21yds lilac #36 - 12yds almond pink #35 - size b/1 crochet hook or size needed to obtain gauge - 12-13 / 30 5-33cm ruffed lilac pillow - tapestry needle
